name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku o! -Kono Yokubukai Game ni Shinpan o!
name_original: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku o! -Kono Yokubukai Game ni Shinpan o!
description: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku o! Kono Yokubukai Game ni Shinpan o! is a Adventure/Visual Novel game published by 5pb released on September 7, 2017 for the PlayStation Vita.
